    Animatable - org.kelvinizer.animation中的接口
    The Animatable interface extends the Drawable interface to include methods for handling appearance and disappearance animations of an object.
    AnimatablePanel - org.kelvinizer.animation中的类
    The AnimatablePanel class is an extension of JPanel that implements Animatable, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, MouseListener, Scalable, and Drawable.
    AnimatablePanel() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.animation.AnimatablePanel
    Creates an AnimatablePanel with a default start duration of 500 milliseconds.
    AnimatablePanel(long) - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.animation.AnimatablePanel
    Creates an AnimatablePanel with a specified start duration for the appearance animation.
    App - org.kelvinizer中的类
